It is a consumer's money for a producer's time and service. I also argue that whether one believes it is immoral or not, should that person's opinion control the entire country, as an example if one believes that interracial marriage is immoral they are entitled to their opinion however they don't have the right to trample other's marriage rights. Prostitution is Malum prohibitum as opposed to Malum en se. There will be much, much less people that are trafficked in from other countries to be forced into prostitution, and if they are they will be caught/saved sooner. How many of those people look like they are being forced to work there? Also to have any job in the United States you already need to provide multiple forms of identification including citizenship.
